segments.text: I'm really surprised by what I'm seeing in this kitchen, it's quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is just pouring out onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's completely oblivious to the mess and the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that unstable stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised he hasn't fallen off yet, it looks so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on, and how much longer it will continue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so surprising, I never expected to see something like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices what's happening soon, before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
